docs.snippet: IN his youth, the writer J. Anthony Lukas composed a short story--I forget what it was called--about a little man who spends his life  preparing what his dying words will be....

docs.snippet: HOUSTON, Jan. 16 (UPI) Cliff Robinson, a rookie, equaled his best National Basketball Association scoring performance with 22 points and Mike Newlin poured in 14 of his 30 points in the final quarter to help the New Jersey Nets earn a 122-112 vict...
docs.lead_paragraph: HOUSTON, Jan. 16 (UPI) Cliff Robinson, a rookie, equaled his best National Basketball Association scoring performance with 22 points and Mike Newlin poured in 14 of his 30 points in the final quarter to help the New Jersey Nets earn a 122-112 victory tonight over the Houston Rockets.

headline.main: Robinson and Newlin Help Nets Triumph; Kings 112, Bucks 108 Celtics 114, Bulls 104 Pacers 117, Nuggets 99

docs.snippet: In Times Square, just around the corner from the 42d Street movie houses featuring such films as "Pleasure Girls" and "Slave of the Cannibal God," workmen in a house that until recently showed pornographic movies have been stripping away the accum...
docs.lead_paragraph: In Times Square, just around the corner from the 42d Street movie houses featuring such films as "Pleasure Girls" and "Slave of the Cannibal God," workmen in a house that until recently showed pornographic movies have been stripping away the accumulated years of grime and installing glittering crystal chandeliers.
docs.abstract: Newly refurbished Rialto Theater on 42d Street will reopen on Feb 7 as legitimate Broadway theater; Robert Brandt of Brandt Organization, comments (M)

headline.main: Rialto to Reopen Feb. 7 As Legitimate Theater; Demand For Legitimate Theater Intimate House Intended

docs.snippet: Louis Wolfe, senior vice president and general manager of Avon Books, has been elected chairman and chief executive officer of Bantam Books, the giant paperback publishing company, effective Feb. 1, it was announced yesterday. He replaces Oscar Dy...
docs.lead_paragraph: Louis Wolfe, senior vice president and general manager of Avon Books, has been elected chairman and chief executive officer of Bantam Books, the giant paperback publishing company, effective Feb. 1, it was announced yesterday. He replaces Oscar Dystel, who has occupied the post for 25 years.
docs.abstract: Names Louis Wolfe chairman and chief executive officer, succeeding Oscar Dystel (S)

headline.main: Wolfe to Head Bantam Books; Three Big Sellers
